channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Lufthansa, Eurowings, other travel industry players push forward with Web3
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: After a new travel-focused blockchain hit the scene, major players in the industry are beginning to pivot to integrate Web3 technology.

item.title: ‘It’s going to get worse for banks’ — JPMorgan CEO on overregulation
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: JPMorgan CEO says the Fed should be less focused on adding more rules and regulations for banks and more on fixing the banking crisis.

item.title: Lawsuit against FTX celebrity promoters gets backup from former exec
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Daniel Friedberg, the former top compliance chief for FTX and FTX US, has provided a declaration that could support the lawsuit.

item.title: Memecoins are like Powerball for crypto fans: Matrixport exec
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Felix Ng
item.description: For a lucky few, memecoins can provide a “path to wealth,” but for others, they’re simply a “risky gamble,” Matrixport’s Markus Thielen tells Cointelegraph.

item.title: Binance.US seeking ways to cut Changpeng Zhao's majority stake: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: Changpeng Zhao is the crypto exchange’s founder, majority owner and chair. He is also the CEO and co-founder of the global crypto exchange, Binance.

item.title: US Chamber of Commerce slams SEC's ‘haphazard’ regulation efforts
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: The largest business organization in the world has thrown its weight behind Coinbase in its fight against the SEC.

item.title: Silvergate begins NYSE delisting process as it readies to cut 230 staff
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: The parent company of the defunct Silvergate Bank disclosed significant staff cuts and the delisting of its securities in an SEC filing.

item.title: Big breath as Beacon Chain stops finalizing ... and then recovers
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: The Ethereum mainnet briefly stopped finalizing transactions but recovered after 25 minutes.

item.title: Pepe would be ashamed by PEPE investors
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Joe Hall
item.description: Memes come and go, but greed, harassment and “community” are stalwarts of the crypto industry.

item.title: Alameda’s $38B IRS bill, Do Kwon kicked in the assets, Milady frenzy: Asia Express
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: IRS wants $38B in unpaid taxes from Alameda, Milady token surges 3,000%, restraining order for Arthur Hayes over 3AC “threatening” words.

item.title: US House financial committee tells SEC they don’t like custody proposal
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The letter criticizes the proposed rule for its impact on the banking industry, particularly in ways that would be disadvantageous to the digital asset industry.

item.title: Federal Reserve's FedNow will integrate with Metal Blockchain
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The integration will allow users to instantly convert cash to stablecoin for use in DeFi protocols.

item.title: BlockFi users to get back $297M from Wallet accounts: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Return of funds does not apply to users of interest-bearing accounts, ruled U.S. Bankruptcy Judge Michael Kaplan.

item.title: BlockGPT launches ‘chat to earn’ ecosystem for training AI
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: A new Web3 initiative aims to build a ChatGPT-style artificial intelligence system on the blockchain.

item.title: Safaricom M-Pesa receives Ethiopian mobile money license, ending state monopoly
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The Kenya-based company already has 3 million mobile phone users in Ethiopia and plans to make it the 10th country where the payment service will be available.

item.title: Elon Musk announces he will step down as Twitter CEO
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The soon-to-be-former CEO will become Twitter’s executive chair and chief technology officer, overseeing product, software and system operations.

item.title: 'The SEC’s actions have crippled a nascent industry' — Paradigm requests amicus brief for Coinbase
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: According to Paradigm, the SEC's lack of a clear path for crypto firms to register could lead to a “de facto ban on digital asset trading platforms.”

item.title: 'We screwed up' — Coinbase CLO responds to outrage after exchange associated Pepe with hate groups
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Paul Grewal said Coinbase was attempting “to provide a fact-based picture of a trending topic” to its users when saying Pepe "has been co-opted as a hate symbol" by certain groups.

item.title: MetaMask rolls out ETH purchases via PayPal to US users
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Users in the United States can also transfer ETH from PayPal to MetaMask. The companies first announced their collaboration in 2022.

item.title: Watchdog sues SEC over FOIA access to docs on potential crypto conflict of interest
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: EMPOWR is requesting correspondences between former SEC officials William Hinman, Marc Berger and Jay Clayton and their current employers.

item.title: Researchers in Singapore design new ‘more efficient’ DAO scheme
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.category: SUSS researchers compared eight different DAO voting schemes to determine the most effective method for the design of a novel hybrid scheme.
item.description: Scientists at Singapore University of Social Sciences created a novel DAO voting/governance scheme after reviewing current methods.

item.title: GAO cites exposure to digital assets in exploring collapse of Signature Bank
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Michael Clements said the GAO had reviewed “large deposits from the digital asset space” in considering whether crypto had contributed to Signature’s failure.

item.title: How to use a crypto hardware wallet
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Shailey Singh
item.description: To use a crypto hardware wallet, connect wallet to computer/mobile, enter PIN, follow instructions to send/receive crypto, then store safely offline for added security.

item.title: BIS issues comprehensive paper on offline CBDC payments
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: According to the Bank for International Settlements, offline payments with CBDCs raise new risks related to counterfeiting, fraud and privacy concerns.

item.title: BTC price risks $27K loss as Bitcoin trend lines brew ‘bullish cross’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: BTC price action offers little relief to Bitcoin bulls despite U.S. macro data releases showing inflation subsiding.

item.title: How the IRS seized $10B worth of crypto using blockchain analytics
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: A public-private partnership with blockchain analytics firm Chainalysis has played a key role in helping the Internal Revenue Service solve cryptocurrency-related crimes.

item.title: 8 smart strategies for effectively explaining a blockchain scaling solution
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Innovation Circle
item.description: Non-experts are much more likely to grasp the value of a scaling solution if it’s related to something they already understand.

item.title: Do Kwon’s lawyers propose $436K bail as authorities prepare for June trial
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Lawyers said Do Kwon and Han Chang-joon could be released on bail and largely confined to a Montenegro apartment with the “obligation to periodically report to the state authority.”

item.title: Milady memecoin surges 5,250% after Musk tweet, exchange listings
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The market capitalization of the LADYS token has surpassed $140 million after surging in popularity.

item.title: Cryptocurrency trading addiction: What to look out for and how it is treated
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Mitch Eiven
item.description: The epic highs and lows of cryptocurrency trading make traders particularly prone to addictive trading behavior.
